David Kenneth Popejoy (amụrụ na 15 Febụwarị n'afọ 1972) bụ onye America lara ezumike nká na-atụpu hama.
O sonyere na 1996 Olympic Games ya na 1997 World Championships n'erughị nke ikpeazụ. O sonyeere ezigbo enyi ya Kevin McMahon, onye sonyere na 1996 Olympics na 2000 Olympic Games.
Ihe kacha mma ọ tụrụ bụ mita 74.26, nke o nwetara na ọnwa June n'afọ 1996 na Atlanta.
